_sText:
Grenades map with a bombable zone, water area, and main tennis area.

On this map there are many HE grenades on the ground and about 8 flashbangs. Every player starts with 1 smoke grenade and a HE grenade.

Screenshot looks a little messed because of 3 things:
A: My graphic card.
B: I had to compress 4 images into 1.
C: I had to put it in JPEG format.

Players:
Recommended 10-25

The colorful glass looks NORMAL ingame unless you have a shit gFX card with about 0 rendering.
